item.description:
The BSA Boston Architecture Meetup Group is an informal forum for architects, designers and other professionals to network and socialize and shape the future of the building industry!
We get together for all kinds of design-related events like tours, films, lectures, etc. Come and talk about mentoring, ethics, work/life balance, green design, the future of architecture as a profession, and more.
Our members include: architects; designers and other design industry professionals; engineers; contractors; planners; interior designers; landscape architects; developers; real estate professionals; building materials suppliers and other vendors; consultants; urban renewal, environmental and other community organizations and more!
This group is sponsored by EPNet (the Emerging Professionals Network) which is a community of the Boston Society of Architects/AIA. www.architects.org/epnet
Subscribe to free BSA e-newsletters or join committees: http://www.architects.org/subscribe
Join our Facebook group: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=6568511332
Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/BSAAIA
BSA Membership is open to everyone, but not required to participate. Read "About us" for more information or join the BSA at www.architects.org/join
item.name: The Boston Architecture Meetup Group
